description: A gaming hobbyist in-between jobs spent his free time playing his favorite online game. After enjoying the last day of service with his friends he awoke in an area that hadn’t existed in the game. Then he met a lone woman. It turns out his appearance had been overtaken by that of his character. In this world, he uses his new found power to enjoy complete freedom.>
